name: Out of Time! GMTK20 Submission
description:
Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

The Theme was 'Out Of Time'.

-----------------------------------------------

Earth is seconds away from being blown up and its up to you to save everyone!

Take food to your rocket to lure the people to safety!

How To Play:

(Click the full screen button)

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Walk over to food to pick it up then to the rocket to put it in.

Walk into the rocket to blast of once everyones in.

Get everyone (and yourself) in before the timer runs out!

-----------------------------------------------

Art and code by Joel Luckett

Sound by Jacob Luckett
